QuestData.Title: Work Order: The Klaxxi II
QuestData.Description: Once your mogu pumpkins are ready to be picked, you'll need only to package them for pick-up.$b$bI wouldn't dilly-dally if I were you. The Klaxxi aren't known for their patience!
QuestData.LogDescription: Harvest 8 Ripe Mogu Pumpkin plants and provide 40 Mogu Pumpkins for the Klaxxi.
